summary: A time machine's tested first time by a man in the team traveling 1 hour into the future. He returns to warn them against killings in the next hour. Is it possible to change things in the "past"? Twist after twist follow.
cast: Zoë Bell|Malik Yoba|Adam Huss|Bjørn Alexander|Brian Flaccus|Michael Aaron Milligan|Steve Suh|Darren Bailey|Nick Benseman|Jonathan Camp|Courtney Compton|Dustin Cornelius|Ashley Hayes|Jesse Jacobs|James Logan|John Nania|Malene Ostergaard|Eric Perrodin|Zo Zosak
keywords: fall to death|brain damage|throat cut|discovering a dead body|time paradox
title: Paradox
